pageProps.content:
Experience

Denis Private Island, a 375-acre private coral island is located amid the warm waters of the Indian Ocean in the beautiful Seychelles.
The island is home to lush palm trees & white powdery beaches, ensuring an authentic island experience. Many will agree that this is a tropical paradise that is all about simple exclusivity.
Denis Island offers a relaxing beach atmosphere & exceptional service. Guests staying here will be in good hands as the staff will cater to your every whim.
The PADI dive centre provides diving lessons & excursions to explore the tropical waters for turtles, dolphins & even whale sharks. The island has a great reputation for deep-sea fishing, so guests can charter a vessel & crew to find out what is lurking in the waters below.

Stay

The island is home to 25 free-standing cottages & villas, scattered at various walking distances from the beach & separated by the island’s natural vegetation.
There are 3 beach cottages, 10 deluxe beach cottages, 10 beachfront spa cottages & a beach villa.
The beach cottages lie directly on the beachfront & feature private sun loungers & a furnished sea-facing veranda. The deluxe beach cottages are sea-facing & feature an open terrace leading into a private garden & onto the beach. They come complete with sun loungers, a personal sala & daybed.
Exquisite beachfront spa cottages lie directly on the beachfront. Each spa cottage boasts a secluded deck with a sala & day bed as well as a private courtyard & garden with a massage pavilion.
The beach villa has a private beachfront setting, with an extensive outdoor living & relaxation area complete with a plunge pool & daybed. The private courtyard features twin alfresco showers.
Resort facilities include a library, swimming pool & bar.

Activities

Apart from diving & snorkelling, guests can enjoy canoeing, village visits, tennis, jogging or bird watching.

subfolders.title: Anantara Maia Luxury Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: S Anantara Maia Luxury Resort & Spa is nestled on a lush hillside of a scenic peninsula on Mahe Island, Seychelles.

subfolders.title: Banyan Tree Seychelles
subfolders.description: Banyan Tree Seychelles overlooks one of the world’s most beautiful beaches:  Intendance Bay.  This white, sandy beach is located on the southwest coast of Mahe Island in the Seychelles. Surrounded by palm trees & lush green vegetation, Banyan Tree Seychelles offers the best in barefoot luxury & 5-star service.

subfolders.title: Constance Ephelia Resort
subfolders.description: The beautiful, family-friendly Constance Ephelia Resort is located on the northwest coast of Mahe island & is – without a doubt – one of the most popular resorts in the Seychelles. The resort overlooks the Port Launay National Marine Park, offering a treasure trove of discovery for divers & snorkelers.

subfolders.title: Constance Lemuria Resort
subfolders.description: The beautiful Praslin Island is one of the most beautiful islands in the Seychelles & it is here where you will find the luxurious Constance Lemuria Resort. The Seychelles is home to 115 islands, of which Praslin has been referred to in the past by the early explorers as ‘the Garden of Eden.’

subfolders.title: Cousine Island
subfolders.description: Have you ever dreamt of staying on a secluded, private island - surrounded by miles & miles of warm, turquoise water & lush, palm trees?  The lavish Cousine Island is not only an idyllic & private tropical destination but also one that is dedicated to nature conservation. Yes, the island might be small – around 30 hectares big – yet it is packed with wildlife.

subfolders.title: Denis Private Island Lodge
subfolders.description: Denis Private Island, a 375-acre private coral island is located amid the warm waters of the Indian Ocean in the beautiful Seychelles.   The island is home to lush palm trees & white powdery beaches, ensuring an authentic island experience.  Many will agree that this is a tropical paradise that is all about simple exclusivity.

subfolders.title: Enchanted Island Resort
subfolders.description: As the name suggests, Enchanted Island Resort is located on a captivating 5-acre private island, just a short boat ride from Mahe Island in the Seychelles. Here, guests can escape the hustle & bustle of everyday life & embrace a luxurious island experience where private plunge pools & outdoor showers are just as important as beautiful, white sandy beaches & crystal-clear waters.

subfolders.title: Four Seasons Desroches Island
subfolders.description: Four Seasons Desroches Island is set on a private island in the Seychelles.  It is not surprising that this slice of paradise is considered one of the most pristine & untouched islands in the world.   Desroches is fortunate in that it enjoys a healthy climate year-round, along with miles of unspoilt beaches & picturesque scenery.

subfolders.title: Four Seasons Resort Seychelles
subfolders.description: Four Seasons Resort Seychelles is located on 70-acres of lush, tropical gardens on the southwest coast of Mahe in the Republic of Seychelles. This archipelago consists of 115 islands, of which only 20 are inhabited – providing all who visit with a sense of escape, adventure & discovery.

subfolders.title: Hilton Seychelles Labriz Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Hilton Seychelles Labriz Resort & Spa is a 5* luxury resort set on the east coast of one of the most beautiful private islands in the Seychelles:  Silhouette Island. The island is covered with jungles, mountains, rainforests & pristine beaches – offering all who visit an authentic island experience.

subfolders.title: Hilton Seychelles Northolme Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: The luxurious Hilton Seychelles Northolme is perched on a hillside among granite boulders, amongst a lush forest of coconut trees, offering breathtaking views of the crystal-clear ocean & white, sandy beach. With a secluded setting, luxurious villas & a relaxing wellness spa – The Hilton Northolme is especially popular among honeymooners or romantics looking for a tranquil island experience.

subfolders.title: Le Domaine de La Reserve
subfolders.description: The family-owned Le Domaine de La Reserve is set in a marine national park on one of the Seychelles most beautiful islands:  Praslin. The Seychelles is home to 115 islands, of which Praslin has been referred to in the past by the early explorers as ‘the Garden of Eden.’

subfolders.title: Le Domaine de L'Orangeraie
subfolders.description: Hidden away on the beautiful island of La Digue, which is said to be one of the most unspoiled islands in the Seychelles, lies Le Domaine de L’Orangeraie. This peaceful resort is all about slowing down & enjoying island life to its fullest.  Snorkelling, diving, sunbathing & relaxing spa treatments will help you get there – fast.

subfolders.title: North Island
subfolders.description: Located on one of the world’s most astonishing private islands, North Island is a rare sanctuary for those seeking a luxurious, unspoiled & completely exclusive tropical haven.   Fit for royalty, it is not surprising that North Island was recently voted Nr 1 in the World’s ‘Best of the Best’ category by Conde Nast Traveller & was chosen as the 2011 honeymoon escape for Prince William & Kate.

subfolders.title: Raffles Seychelles
subfolders.description: Raffles Seychelles is set on a hillside on the famous Praslin Island & overlook Anse Tamake, a beautiful expanse of white sand & turquoise waters. The Seychelles is home to 115 islands, of which Praslin has been referred to in the past by the early explorers as ‘the Garden of Eden.’

subfolders.title: Six Senses Zil Pasyon
subfolders.description: The Six Senses Zil Pasyon is set on the private Felicite Island off the coast of La Digue & is a short helicopter or boat ride from Praslin Island, making it a well-placed destination for island-hopping excursions. Offering a wide range of accommodation for honeymooners, couples as well as families & friends travelling together – Zil Pasyon is the quintessential Seychelles experience.

whatWeLoveItems: Beach villas located just meters from the ocean
PADI dive centre – excursions to see dolphins, turtles & whale sharks
A range of water sports, including deep-sea fishing
